Patient Particulars: Name: Amy; Sex: Female; Marital status: Unmarried
History: Present history: Patient was in a romantic relationship with a man with whom she got pregnant after a few months of dating. She has been facing difficulty in her relationship as he has not been consistently active in their relationship. There was a recent incident where her partner felt insecure and got physically violent with her on impulse which scared both of them; Personal history: Occupation- Patient used to work earlier but left due to pregnancy.
Current Mental Status Examination: General behavior: Patient was cooperative and rapport was established; Thought: Content- reflected disappointment in her partner.
Psychotherapy Type: Type: Person Centered Therapy; Mode: Individual
Issues discussed in Current Session: Patient expressed her need to get a job and start working again to manage finances for herself as well as her baby. She was in a dilemma of being a good mother and leaving the child behind to work.
Next session details: Next session will include discussion around safety of the patient and her child as well as plan more about her steps to get and manage with a new job.
